description: Functional: Extend ContractWizardData with renewal mode, notice period, term months, and override toggle fields.
Functional: Initialize renewal fields in ContractWizard default state for new contracts.
Functional: Hydrate renewal fields when resuming draft contracts in the wizard.
Functional: Hydrate renewal fields when editing existing contracts in the wizard.
Functional: Render Renewal Settings card in ContractBasicsStep when end date is present.
Functional: Render Evergreen Review settings card in ContractBasicsStep when end date is absent.
Functional: Show renewal mode selector with values none/manual/auto in ContractBasicsStep.
Functional: Show notice period selector/input in ContractBasicsStep for renewal-enabled modes.
Functional: Show renewal term behavior input in ContractBasicsStep for auto-renew mode.
Functional: Hide auto-renew-specific term controls when renewal mode is not auto.
Functional: Validate renewal mode is required when an end date is set.
Functional: Validate notice period is a non-negative integer within configured bounds.
Functional: Validate renewal term months is positive when explicitly provided.
Functional: Show inline validation errors for invalid renewal settings before wizard progression.
Functional: Include renewal fields in contract summary preview in ContractBasicsStep.
Functional: Include renewal fields in review step payload preview before submit.
Functional: Persist renewal fields in ClientContractWizardSubmission payload builder.
Functional: Persist renewal fields when saving draft contracts from wizard.
Functional: Add tenant default renewal mode field to default billing settings model.
Functional: Add tenant default notice period days field to default billing settings model.
Functional: Add tenant default due-date action policy field to default billing settings model.
Functional: Add tenant default renewal ticket board field to default billing settings model.
Functional: Add tenant default renewal ticket status field to default billing settings model.
Functional: Add tenant default renewal ticket priority field to default billing settings model.
Functional: Add tenant default renewal ticket assignee field to default billing settings model.
Functional: Expose renewal defaults in getDefaultBillingSettings action response.
Functional: Persist renewal defaults in updateDefaultBillingSettings action writes.
Functional: Add use-tenant-defaults toggle to contract renewal settings payload.
Functional: Apply tenant defaults to contract assignment when override toggle is enabled.
Functional: Apply explicit contract-level override values when override toggle is disabled.
Functional: Enforce deterministic fallback precedence when override fields are partially missing.
Functional: Expose effective renewal settings in contract assignment read APIs.
Functional: Compute decision_due_date for fixed-term assignments using end_date minus notice_period_days.
Functional: Compute next evergreen review anchor date from active contract anniversary rules.
Functional: Compute evergreen decision_due_date using anchor date minus notice_period_days.
Functional: Normalize decision_due_date calculations to date-only semantics used by client_contracts.
Functional: Recompute decision_due_date when contract end_date changes.
Functional: Recompute decision_due_date when notice period changes.
Functional: Recompute decision_due_date when renewal mode changes between none/manual/auto.
Functional: Recompute decision_due_date when evergreen anchor basis changes.
Functional: Skip decision_due_date generation for terminated/expired contract assignments.
Functional: Skip decision_due_date generation when renewal mode is none and no evergreen review is configured.
Functional: Create one renewal cycle key per contract assignment cycle for deduplication.
Functional: Prevent duplicate active renewal work items for same tenant/client_contract_id/cycle key.
Functional: Persist cycle_start and cycle_end boundaries for each generated renewal cycle.
Functional: Expose days_until_due as derived queue field for UI sorting and badges.
Functional: Clamp past-due decision calculations into queue visibility without negative date corruption.
Functional: Add renewals tab value and metadata to billing tab configuration.
Functional: Add Renewals Tabs.Content route to BillingDashboard tab host.
Functional: Add Renewals queue page component under billing dashboard components.
Functional: Load renewal queue rows from server action on Renewals page mount.
Functional: Render default 90-day horizon rows in Renewals queue.
Functional: Render bucket quick filters for 0-30, 31-60, and 61-90 days.
Functional: Render owner filter for assigned user in Renewals queue.
Functional: Render status filter for pending/renewing/non_renewing/snoozed/completed.
Functional: Render renewal mode filter for none/manual/auto.
Functional: Render contract type filter for fixed-term versus evergreen entries.
Functional: Sort queue by decision_due_date ascending by default.
Functional: Show days-remaining visual state for due-soon and overdue entries.
Functional: Add Upcoming Renewals summary widget to ClientContractsTab.
Functional: Show 90-day bucket counts in ClientContractsTab upcoming renewals widget.
Functional: Navigate from upcoming renewals widget to Renewals tab preserving filter context.
Functional: Refresh widget counts after queue action mutations complete.
Functional: Define queue status enum values pending/renewing/non_renewing/snoozed/completed in renewal work-item model.
Functional: Implement mark-renewing action that transitions pending entries to renewing.
Functional: Implement mark-non-renewing action that transitions pending entries to non_renewing.
Functional: Implement create-renewal-draft action for eligible queue entries.
Functional: Implement snooze action that sets status to snoozed with snoozed_until date.
Functional: Implement assign-owner action to set assigned_to on renewal work item.
Functional: Implement unsnooze transition back to pending when snooze period elapses.
Functional: Persist action actor user id on each queue mutation.
Functional: Persist action timestamp on each queue mutation.
Functional: Persist action reason/note text on queue mutation when provided.
Functional: Prevent invalid transition from completed back to pending without explicit reopen action.
Functional: Prevent invalid transition from non_renewing to renewing without explicit override action.
Functional: Enforce snooze date must be in the future on action validation.
Functional: Expose queue row action availability based on current status.
Functional: Show optimistic UI state while queue actions are in-flight.
Functional: Refresh affected queue row state after successful action response.
Functional: Include linked draft contract id in queue row once renewal draft is created.
Functional: Include linked ticket id in queue row once due-date ticket is created.
Functional: Mark work item completed when renewed contract activation is confirmed.
Functional: Mark work item completed when non-renewal finalization is confirmed.
Functional: Create scheduled renewal processor that scans due decision windows for active contracts.
Functional: Upsert renewal work items during scheduled processing for newly eligible cycles.
Functional: Respect tenant default due-date action policy during scheduled processing.
Functional: Respect contract-level override due-date action policy during scheduled processing.
Functional: Create internal ticket at decision due date when effective policy is create_ticket.
Functional: Call workflow runtime tickets.create action for renewal ticket creation path.
Functional: Populate renewal ticket title with client and contract context.
Functional: Populate renewal ticket description with due date and renewal settings context.
Functional: Populate renewal ticket routing fields from effective renewal ticket defaults.
Functional: Persist created ticket id on renewal work item after successful ticket creation.
Functional: Use idempotency key per tenant/client_contract_id/cycle key for ticket creation.
Functional: Skip duplicate ticket creation when idempotent renewal cycle already has linked ticket.
Functional: Record automation_error on work item when ticket creation fails.
Functional: Allow manual retry action to re-attempt ticket creation for failed work items.
Functional: Ensure due-date automation supports queue-only policy without creating tickets.
Functional: Publish/emit renewal-upcoming domain event payloads compatible with queue creation semantics.
Functional: Generate renewal queue entries for evergreen contracts based on annual review cycle.
Functional: Display evergreen contract type badge in queue rows.
Functional: Show evergreen cycle anchor date in queue row details.
Functional: Support mark-renewing action for evergreen queue entries.
Functional: Support mark-non-renewing action for evergreen queue entries.
Functional: Support create-renewal-draft action for evergreen queue entries.
Functional: Roll evergreen cycle forward to next annual window after completion.
Functional: Prevent duplicate evergreen cycle entries for the same annual period.
Functional: Respect evergreen-specific notice period overrides on decision date computation.
Functional: Include evergreen entries in upcoming renewals widget counts.
Functional: Extend contract expiration report action to expose decision_due_date alongside end_date where available.
Functional: Include renewal mode in expiration report row payload.
Functional: Include queue status in expiration report row payload when work item exists.
Functional: Keep existing expiration report rows for fixed-term contracts without renewal config.
Functional: Keep existing expiration report sort compatibility for existing report consumers.
Functional: Expose at-risk count based on decision_due_date windows for dashboard usage.
Functional: Align contract reports tab expiration copy to reference renewal decisions as well as expiration.
Functional: Ensure legacy auto_renew display derives from new renewal mode values.
Functional: Register renewal scheduled processing job in pg-boss on-prem scheduling path.
Functional: Register renewal scheduled processing workflow in Temporal hosted/EE scheduling path.
Functional: Use shared renewal processing core logic callable from both pg-boss and Temporal adapters.
Functional: Keep effective behavior parity for queue creation between pg-boss and Temporal runners.
Functional: Keep effective behavior parity for ticket creation idempotency between pg-boss and Temporal runners.
Functional: Honor existing JobRunnerFactory runtime selection without forcing edition-specific code forks in business logic.
Functional: Fallback gracefully to supported runner path when temporal bootstrap is unavailable.
Functional: Preserve tenant-scoped execution semantics in both runtime paths.
Functional: Enforce billing read permission on renewals queue list endpoints.
Functional: Enforce billing update permission on queue mutation endpoints.
Functional: Enforce billing settings update permission on renewal defaults update endpoints.
Functional: Apply tenant filter to all renewal work-item reads by default.
Functional: Apply tenant filter to all renewal work-item writes by default.
Functional: Audit renewal state transitions with actor id and transition metadata.
Functional: Audit ticket automation linkage with actor type system and timestamp metadata.
Functional: Audit renewal draft creation linkage with actor id and timestamp metadata.
Functional: Reject cross-tenant identifiers during queue mutation validation.
Functional: Sanitize user-provided action notes before persistence and render.
Linkage correctness: 'Hydrate renewal fields when resuming draft contracts in the wizard.' stores created draft contract id on work item
Cycle rollover: evergreen behavior remains correct across year boundary for 'Render Evergreen Review settings card in ContractBasicsStep when end date is absent.'

E2E fixed-term renewal: create contract with end date + manual renewal, verify queue row appears in correct 90-day bucket and can be marked renewing.
E2E evergreen renewal: create evergreen contract with annual review settings, verify queue entry generation and annual cycle rollover after completion.
E2E due-date automation ticketing: due entry creates exactly one ticket and links ticket id on renewal work item.
E2E queue action flow: mark renewing auto-creates draft, open editor, then complete work item after activation.
E2E permissions: billing-read can view queue but cannot mutate, billing-update can execute queue actions.
E2E defaults and overrides: tenant default create-ticket policy applies, then per-contract override to queue-only suppresses ticket creation.
